content: {"name": "Church of Christ Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Call (301) 733-5244 first to make an appointment. If no answer, leave name and phone number to call back.\n* If you don't eat certain food, you should let the church pantry know so it won't get wasted.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "10014 White Hall Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Hagerstown", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21740", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.5895962, "longitude": -77.6594289}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 733-5244", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Once a year"}]}
